section.title: Repository
section.para: NakedObjects is a respository for NOF providing a central access point for the Configuration, NakedObjectsLoader, and ObjectManager objects amongst other things. It is a abstract singleton that expects it concrete subclass to store these details. There are a number of implementation within the NOF, specifically one for client side use (NakedObjectsClient), which is for use in applications where there is one of each component and hence no ssharing. The other main implementation is for server use (NakedObjectsByThread), which keeps the one instance of each component for each thread in use.
To install a repository instantiate an instance of it, it will act as singleton storing a reference to itself.
To get hold of one of the components held by the repository use the static get methods on the NakedObjects class.
